title: Sins of the father and of the son
creator_credit: National Film School (Great Britain), Jackie Johnstone and Harry Hook
brief_description: Starring Jonathan Dockar-Drysdale, Hilary Hook, Camille Davies, Gigi Soames. Tells of a young man’s journey to see his estranged father, a retired Army Colonel living on an island in the Indian Ocean where he studies Islamic culture. The strangeness of the culture and the surroundings lead to a break in the father and son’s relationship.
